quiet.name: Quiet
quiet.description: Do not show any synchronization information in the console.

db_path.name: Database Path
db_path.description: CodeChain databases will be stored in {}.

keys_path.name: Keys Path
keys_path.description: Your encrypted private keys will be stored in {}.

base_path.name: Base Path
base_path.description: Blockchain and settings will be stored in {}.

mem_pool_mem_limit.name: Mem Pool Mem Limit
mem_pool_mem_limit.description: Maximum amount of memory(in MB) that can be used by the mem pool. Setting this parameter to 0 disables limiting.

mem_pool_fee_bump_shift.name: Mem Pool Mem Limit
mem_pool_fee_bump_shift.description: A value which is used to check whether a new transaciton can replace a transaction in the memory pool with the same signer and seq. If the fee of the new transaction is `new_fee` and the fee of the transaction in the memory pool is `old_fee`, then `new_fee > old_fee + old_fee >> mem_pool_fee_bump_shift` should be satisfied to replace.

notify_work.name: Notify Work
notify_work.description: URLs to which work package notifications are pushed.

force_sealing.name: Force Sealing
force_sealing.description: Force the node to author new blocks as if it were always sealing/mining.

description.none: New transactions will not cause a new pending block to be created.
description.own: New pending block will be created only on transactions sent using local RPC/IPC
description.ext: New pending block will be created only on external transactions.
description.all: New pending block will be created for all transactions (both local and external).

reseal_min_period.name: Reseal Period
reseal_min_period.description: Specify the minimum time between reseals from incoming transactions. MS is time measured in milliseconds.

reseal_max_period.name: Reseal max period
reseal_max_period.description: Specify the maximum time since last block to enable force-sealing. MS is time measured in milliseconds.

engine_signer.name: Engine Signer
engine_signer.description: Specify the address which should be used to sign consensus messages and issue blocks.

work_queue_size.name: Work Queue Size
work_queue_size.description: Specify the number of historical work packages which are kept cached lest a solution is found for them later. High values take more memory but result in fewer unusable solutions.

max_peers.name: Max Peers
max_peers.description: Set the maximum number of connections the user would like.

min_peers.name: Min Peers
min_peers.description: Set the minimum number of connections the user would like.

discovery.name: Discovery
discovery.description: Decide how to choose the addresses to be sent. Options are kademlia and unstructured. In a testing environment, an unstructured p2p network is desirable because it is more than sufficient when there are a few nodes(< 100).

discovery_refresh.name: Discovery Refresh
discovery_refresh.description: Refresh timeout of discovery. MS is time measured in milliseconds.

network.description: Network and peer-related settings. Network is not available if CodeChain is in offline mode.

disable.name: Disable JSON-RPC
disable.description: You won't be able to interact with CodeChain using JSON-RPC over HTTP.

interface.name: Interface
interface.description: Specify the interface address for rpc connections.

port.name: Port
port.description: Listen for rpc connections on PORT.

disable.name: Disable IPC
disable.description: You won't be able to use IPC to interact with CodeChain.

path.name: Path
path.description: CodeChain will create an IPC socket at {}.

interface.name: Interface
interface.description: Specify the interface address for the WebSockets JSON-RPC server.

port.name: Port

max_connections.name: Max Connections
max_connections.description: Maximum number of allowed concurrent WebSockets JSON-RPC connections.

disable_stratum.name: Disable Stratum
disable_stratum.description: Do not run Stratum server for miner push notification.

port.name: Port
port.description: Stratum Server will be running on port {}.
